original_file: 待处理知识库\SRMS Support\帮小区重新列印DemandNote.docx

qa_pairs.question: 相关问题
qa_pairs.answer:
文档来源：帮小区重新列印DemandNote

直接重印（参数USERID，从PROJ表根据PROJID查询获取到）
select SITE_USERID from PROJ where projid = '50332'
更新Autopay再重印
qa_pairs.source: 文档来源：帮小区重新列印DemandNote

qa_pairs.question: [数字].[数字] 备份openamt （参数BU，和对应PERIOD）
qa_pairs.answer:
文档来源：帮小区重新列印DemandNote

更新对应小区MRIEVENT任务（参数 USERID，和NEXTEVENT小于当前时间），如果小区指定列印某一栋，则只更新某一栋就行。
列印完成后，需要将Openamt还原
keywords: 如果小区指定列印某一栋
qa_pairs.source: 文档来源：帮小区重新列印DemandNote

raw_content.title: 帮小区重新列印DemandNote
raw_content.source_file: 待处理知识库\SRMS Support\帮小区重新列印DemandNote.docx

sections.content:
直接重印（参数USERID，从PROJ表根据PROJID查询获取到）
select SITE_USERID from PROJ where projid = '50332'
更新Autopay再重印

headers:
select * from mrievent where userid = 'CFT-CGPV' and eventstatus = 'ACT' and name like '%Demand Note%'
update mrievent set NEXTEVENT = '20241228 19:30:00' where userid = 'SINS-S5PV' and eventstatus = 'ACT' and name like '%Demand Note%'

sections.heading: 2.1 备份openamt （参数BU，和对应PERIOD）
sections.content:
更新对应小区MRIEVENT任务（参数 USERID，和NEXTEVENT小于当前时间），如果小区指定列印某一栋，则只更新某一栋就行。
列印完成后，需要将Openamt还原

headers:
update cmledg set ddebitamt = openamt, openamt = tranamt where BLDGID in(select BLDGID from BLDG where ENTITYID in (select ENTITYID from ENTITY where PROJID = '50332'))
and PERIOD = '202501' and PROGNAME = 'CMRentup' and openamt = 0

select * from mrievent where userid = 'CFT-CGPV' and eventstatus = 'ACT' and name like '%Demand Note%'

update mrievent set NEXTEVENT = '20241228 19:30:00' where userid = 'SINS-S5PV' and eventstatus = 'ACT' and name like '%Demand Note%'

update cmledg set openamt = ddebitamt, ddebitamt = null where BLDGID in(select BLDGID from BLDG where ENTITYID in (select ENTITYID from ENTITY where PROJID = '50329')) and PERIOD = '202501' and PROGNAME = 'CMRentup' and ddebitamt is not null
